name: Bisleri Mineral Water Bottle
description: 500ml mineral water bottle made from PET plastic
disposal_information: If not recyclable, empty contents and dispose in general waste bin. Never litter.
eco_alternatives: Use a reusable stainless steel water bottle
Invest in a glass water bottle
Install a water filter at home

name: Lay's Classic Potato Chips
description: Classic salted potato chips in a plastic film package
disposal_information: Empty any remaining contents into compost or food waste bin. Clean the package and dispose in general waste bin. The thin plastic film is not typically recyclable in most facilities.
eco_alternatives: Make homemade chips using fresh potatoes
Buy bulk snacks in reusable containers
Choose snacks packaged in paper or cardboard
Support local vendors who use minimal packaging

name: Coca-Cola Glass Bottle
description: 300ml Coca-Cola in a returnable glass bottle
recycling_instructions: Check for any cracks or damage
Return to store if possible, otherwise place in glass recycling bin
disposal_information: Glass bottles can be returned to stores for reuse. If not possible, ensure proper recycling through glass recycling bins.
eco_alternatives: Support local beverage makers using returnable bottles

name: Amul Milk Tetra Pack
description: 1 liter milk in Tetra Pak packaging
disposal_information: Tetra Pak can be recycled in facilities that accept composite materials. If not available, dispose in general waste bin after cleaning.
eco_alternatives: Use glass milk bottles from local dairies
Consider plant-based milk alternatives in recyclable packaging

name: Maggi Noodles Pack
disposal_information: Clean any remaining food residue and dispose in general waste bin. The plastic film is not typically recyclable in most facilities.
eco_alternatives: Buy bulk pasta in paper packaging
Support local noodle makers using minimal packaging

name: Parle-G Biscuit Pack
disposal_information: Clean any remaining crumbs and dispose in general waste bin. The plastic film is not typically recyclable in most facilities.
eco_alternatives: Buy bulk cookies in reusable containers
Support local bakeries using minimal packaging

name: Dabur Honey Glass Jar
description: Pure honey in a glass jar
disposal_information: Glass jars can be recycled indefinitely. Ensure proper cleaning before recycling.
eco_alternatives: Consider bulk honey purchases in glass containers

name: Kurkure Snack Pack
description: Spicy corn snacks in plastic packaging
disposal_information: Clean any remaining food residue and dispose in general waste bin. The plastic film is not typically recyclable in most facilities.
eco_alternatives: Buy bulk snacks in reusable containers
Support local vendors using minimal packaging

name: Amul Butter Paper Pack
disposal_information: Paper packaging can be recycled if clean and free from food residue. If wax-coated, check local recycling guidelines.
eco_alternatives: Support local dairies using minimal packaging

name: Sprite Plastic Bottle
disposal_information: PET plastic bottles are widely recyclable. Ensure proper cleaning before recycling.
eco_alternatives: Invest in a reusable water bottle
